source.80814079:
import spacy
nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")

doc = nlp("We have learned again that democracy is precious.")
for token in doc:
    print(token.text, token.pos_, token.dep_)

import spacy

nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')
doc = nlp("Democracy is fragile. And at this hour, my friends, democracy has prevailed.")
for token in doc:
    print(token.text)
source.fd06f592:
nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')

# Create an nlp object
doc = nlp("I thank my predecessors of both parties for their presence here. I thank them from the bottom of my heart.")
 
# Iterate over the tokens
for token in doc:
    # Print the token and its part-of-speech tag
    print(token, token.tag_, token.pos_, spacy.explain(token.tag_))
source.cd17ab9a:
from spacy import displacy

doc = nlp("But the American story depends not on any one of us, not on some of us, but on all of us.")
displacy.render(doc, style="dep" , jupyter=True)
source.f9fbdfb4:
nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')

# Create an nlp object
doc = nlp("We the People who seek a more perfect Union. This is a great nation and we are a good people.")
 
# Iterate over the tokens
for token in doc:
    # Print the token and its part-of-speech tag
    print(token.text, "-->", token.dep_)
source.10e9728c:
nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')

# Create an nlp object
doc = nlp("A cry for racial justice some 400 years in the making moves us. The dream of justice for all will be deferred no longer.")
 
# Iterate over the tokens
for token in doc:
    # Print the token and its part-of-speech tag
    print(token.text, "-->", token.lemma_)

# Create an nlp object
doc = nlp("A cry for survival comes from the planet itself. A cry that can't be any more desperate or any more clear.")
 
sentences = list(doc.sents)
len(sentences)
source.89b4e9c1:
nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")
doc = nlp("A cry for racial justice some 400 years in the making moves us. The dream of justice for all will be deferred no longer.")
#See the entity present
print(doc.ents)
for ent in doc.ents:
    print(ent.text, ent.start_char, ent.end_char, ent.label_)
source.63a657ca:
from spacy import displacy
nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")
doc= nlp(u"""Few periods in our nation's history have been more challenging or difficult than the one we're in now.
A once-in-a-century virus silently stalks the country.
It's taken as many lives in one year as America lost in all of World War II.
Millions of jobs have been lost.
Hundreds of thousands of businesses closed.
A cry for racial justice some 400 years in the making moves us. The dream of justice for all will be deferred no longer.
A cry for survival comes from the planet itself. A cry that can't be any more desperate or any more clear.
And now, a rise in political extremism, white supremacy, domestic terrorism that we must confront and we will defeat.
To overcome these challenges -- to restore the soul and to secure the future of America -- requires more than words.
It requires that most elusive of things in a democracy:
Unity. """)

entities=[(i, i.label_, i.label) for i in doc.ents]
entities
source.8da8f572:
nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_lg")
tokens = nlp("In another January in Washington, on New Year's Day 1863, Abraham Lincoln signed the Emancipation Proclamation.")

for token in tokens:
    print(token.text, token.has_vector, token.vector_norm, token.is_oov)
source.d3e34139:
from wordcloud import WordCloud, STOPWORDS
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_lg")  # make sure to use larger model!
tokens = nlp("A cry for racial justice some 400 years in the making moves us. The dream of justice for all will be deferred no longer. A cry for survival comes from the planet itself. A cry that can't be any more desperate or any more clear. And now, a rise in political extremism, white supremacy, domestic terrorism that we must confront and we will defeat. To overcome these challenges -- to restore the soul and to secure the future of America -- requires more than words. It requires that most elusive of things in a democracy: Unity. Unity.")

newText =''
for word in tokens:
 if word.pos_ in ['ADJ', 'NOUN']:
  newText = " ".join((newText, word.text.lower()))

wordcloud = WordCloud(stopwords=STOPWORDS, colormap='Reds', background_color="blue").generate(newText)
plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation='bilinear')
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()

%s

"""%string)) dhtml('We will write an American story of hope.' )
